entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
